name: Mercury OG
description: Mercury OG is a potent indica with unknown genetics. It has both the high THC content and a distinct, overwhelming aroma typical of OG strains. This strain is favored for its powerful effects that provide clarity and heightened sensory perception; it is reputed as particularly influential when listening to music. Although uplifting, this indica is on the heavier side, appealing to experienced users who desire strong medicinal treatment.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Sleepy, Hungry, Stress, Pain, Depression, Insomnia, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid
